abstract: The work of Gerhard Richter spans decades and many styles and techniques. So it seems appropriate that a new major exhibition on the German artist at the Tate Modern in London, running through Jan. 8, is titled "Panorama."

lead_paragraph: The work of Gerhard Richter spans decades and many styles and techniques. So it seems appropriate that a new major exhibition on the German artist at the Tate Modern in London, running through Jan. 8, is titled "Panorama." The show includes some of Mr. Richter's greatest works, and coincides with his 80th birthday.

headline.main: Gerhard Richter Show in London Spans Decades
